extendedInfo.description: Field ID Mobile gives you instant access to your inspection and safety compliance information. Field ID provides the most robust yet easy-to-use inspection and safety compliance application for Android devices. Safety professionals using Field IDâs world-class, cloud-based inspection and safety compliance management application can use Field ID Mobile for free. Revolutionize your safety inspections with Field ID Mobile. Field ID Mobile features include: â¢Access your Field ID safety compliance information from the field â¢Direct access to asset information, historic inspections, images and documents â¢Record inspections, audits & QC/QA events either online or offline â¢Manage upcoming and overdue inspection schedules ensuring you are compliant â¢Capture defects and deficiencies in equipment, facilities, job sites and more About Field ID: Field ID is the worldâs leading paperless safety compliance and inspection management system. The companyâs easy-to-use, cloud-based inspection software has revolutionized the way companies manage safety compliance, create safer workplaces, and improve quality assurance processes. Field ID combines web-based technologies with the power of mobile devices and electronic identification (RFID and barcodes) to improve the efficiency, reliability and reporting of workplace safety management. Manufacturers, distributors, third party inspectors and end users worldwide use Field ID to inspect facilities and equipment, improve training management, and track assets such as cranes, slings and harnesses. Requires an account with FieldID.com.
